name: minecraft sandbox ixer
description:
This is a game with a save and load system, this is the best game.............................................................

Minecraft clone

But with physical blocks

And with saving and loading

button S for saving

L to download

play construct arcade https://www.construct.net/en/free-online-games/sandbox-minecraft-ixer-44609/play

How to play

button S for saving

L to load

the arrow to walk

p exit to the menu

the save button saves the game to slot 2

and the load button loads the game for slot two
